Astrum Solar <http://www.astrumsolar.com>
Spread the Word
Get Rewarded for hosting a solar open house!
Do you love your system and your savings?
Help your friends fulfill their New Year’s Resolutions by going green and saving green with Astrum! Invite them to attend a solar open house and make money for doing that!
Astrum Solar will have a solar consultant at your party to answer any questions about what’s involved in going solar. Your neighbors will be able to see how your system works and learn more about how the sun can power their homes and reduce their electricity bills.
YOU'LL RECEIVE $250 FROM EACH SALE FROM THE OPEN HOUSE*
Astrum Solar will cover the cost of the event.
You may promote the event to your community through channels you see fit.
Astrum Solar can provide Marketing materials.
Interested?
Contact Lindsey Williams 443.239.9809 | lindsey.williams@astrumsolar.com <mailto:lindsey.williams@astrumsolar.com>
Download a Printable Flyer: <http://pages.astrumsolar.com/rs/astrumsolarinc/images/AstrumSolar_HostSolarParty.pdf>
You’re receiving this email because you are an Astrum Solar customer.
If the customer decides to cancel participation, they will make every effort to provide Astrum Solar with at least four weeks notice. The customer agrees that an Astrum Solar sales/marketing representative will be onsite to answer questions for visitors.
* You will be paid $250 for each contract signed with Astrum Solar resulting from the open house. A solar power system is customized for per home, so pricing, savings, utility bill and solar bill amounts and actual returns vary based on location, system size, available solar incentives and local utility rates. Financing terms vary by location and are not available in all areas.
